Title: Autoexplore+
Description:
[h1]Overview[/h1]

Characters with [url=https://wiki.cavesofqud.com/wiki/Heightened_Hearing]Heightened Hearing[/url] or [url=https://wiki.cavesofqud.com/wiki/Heightened_Smell]Heightened Smell[/url] mutations will not interrupt autoexploring if they detect an enemy that isn't targeting them.

[h1]Uninstall[/h1]

The mod is safe to add or remove at any point.
